dcterms:description: A dataset for ObjectGoal Navigation, where an agent is tasked with navigating to an instance of a specified object category in an unseen environment, using human demonstrations to learn efficient object-search behavior.
dcterms:title: OBJECTNAV

dcterms:creator: D. Batra

R. Mottaghi
M. Savva
H. Su
dcterms:description: A dataset for the PICK&PLACE task, where an agent must find an object and place it on a specified receptacle, using human demonstrations to learn the task.
dcterms:title: PICK&PLACE
